item.description:
Endurance Karting group is running a couple of 90 minute endurance races on Saturday August 25, at the limerock park track in connecticut. Pricing is $450 per team - we will shoot for 2 or 3 members per team.

Details on pricing about helmet, gloves, suit rental are here:
http://endurancekarting.com/help/pricing.asp

Details on the races here (there are 3 on that day):
http://endurancekarting.com/events/info2012_limerock_August.asp

Once we get closer to the date we can decide which race we want to be in etc - but most likely its going to be the 2 PM one.

Note that you do not need a suit - you need a tough jacket - a leather jacket is fine, some sort of gloves, jeans and close toed shoes (sneakers are fine).

The kart track is the smaller track set inside the actual limerock park track. Its a nice place to be with real weekend races going on around the karting track.

You can get some cheap practice sessions in at about 20$ for 10 mins (for 2+ 10-minute sessions) or 25$ for one 10-min session. Practice sessions are only on Friday however.

Also note that you do not need a team to enter - you can have an individual entry and endurance karting will match you up with a 2 or 3 person team.
item.name: Limerock Park 90-minute Endurance Race
